repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p:
A composite manuscript containing:
The Cittiyār Cupaṭcam (Indien 23a).
A Civatōttiram (?) (Indien 23b).
The Pūtipōtakāraṇakārikakaṭṭaḷai (Indien 23c).
The Uṇmaineṟiviḷakkam (Indien 23d).
The Caṅkarānantakaḷippu (Indien 23e).
The Cōpaṉappāṭṭu (Indien 23f).
Description based on the examination of the original (December 2020).
Dimensions assessed at the time of examination.

supportDesc.condition: Relatively good state of preservation, despite boreholes.

collation.desc: 1 folio = guard leaf (additional). No foliation. Blank recto verso. The leaf is of the type used for additional title page to Ariel manuscripts.

additions.desc: BnF shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 23 (front cover, recto). Covering an earlier sticker.
BnF bequest sticker DON N° (front cover, recto).

binding.p: Pinewood covers apparently fabricated in the BnF.

origin.origDate: Dated to circa 1775 by Vinson (1867) and to 1775 by Cabaton (1912), on unstated grounds (presumably palaeographical and material analysis arguments). Indien 23a internally dated to the year paṟtti (?) of the Jovian cycle. See Indien 23a, U1, f[1]v1. Not after 1854, since part of the collection of Édouard Ariel (1818-1854).

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 7 = Dons: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, no. 1192.

provenance.p: Owned by Édouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequested by Édouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177). Ariel manuscript not acknowledged by Cabaton (1912).

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine (1912). Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 5, no. 23.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. (1866-). Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 5r = p. 5 , no. 23.
Rosny, Léon de (1868). La bibliothèque tamoule de M. Ariel, de Pondichéry. In: Variétés orientales (pp. 177‒224). Paris: Maisonneuve.
Vinson, Julien (1868). Catalogue des manuscrits tamouls. Corrected proofreadings printed by the atelier oriental de l’Imprimerie nationale. BnF “4-IMPROR-77 (B)” — See p. 5, no. 23.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.

revisionDesc.change: Revised by Emmanuel FRANCIS. Version 1, May 2022.
